ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It was a great experience that was both enjoyable and informative, and I would certainly recommend it to another student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Although not exactlyrelevant to my own research, it did provide a good introduction to field work,and it allowed for us to apply our theoretical linguistic knowledge to the documentation of an unfamiliar language. In this aspect as a 'linguistics-in-action' course, it was very enlightening.
